text:
Maurane (born Claudine Luypaerts; 12 November 1960 – 7 May 2018) was a Belgian French language singer and actress. She was born in Ixelles, Belgium. In 2012, she became a member of the Jury in "Nouvelle Star" broadcast on television station D8. She was known for her 2002 single "Tu es mon autre". She also starred in the 2010 movie "My Afternoons with Margueritte".
Maurane died in Schaerbeek, Belgian on 7 May 2018 of suspected cardiac arrest at the age of 57.
